name: WAVE Test Game
description:
This is the first game I have ever made in Unity, made in an afternoon. Scripted using C#.

Controls: wasd for movement, space for jumping (hold to jump higher), click and drag to turn player. Camera is fixed to player and will turn and move with it.

Download the file, WAVE-Royale_v0.1.zip. Extract the contents to a folder. Run unity_test.exe to play the game. Press esc or close the window to quit the game.
